mapper.select: SELECT c.id , c.u_id , c.title , c.content , c.cdate , c.udate , c.cl_id , c.ps_id , cl.p_id FROM linker.card AS c JOIN linker.cardlist AS cl ON cl.id = c.cl_id WHERE cl.p_id=#{p_id} AND c.ps_id = 2 AND ( c.title LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.content LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.cdate like CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) ORDER BY c.cdate desc
